subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Readers keep asking about that now-famous 20-minute shower that Lance Armstrong took - the one that assorted wits in the blogosphere say landed him in hot water - so here is a primer of dos and don’ts during an unexpected drug test.
snippet: Readers keep asking about that now-famous 20-minute shower that Lance Armstrong took - the one that assorted wits in the blogosphere say landed him in hot water - so here is a primer of dos and don’ts during an unexpected drug test.
